Key Findings:

Best Value for Desktop Upgrades (16GB):

  • DDR3: ~$1.00/GB ($16-20 for 16GB kit)
  • DDR4 32GB: ~$1.34/GB ($43 for 32GB kit)
  • DDR5 128GB: ~$1.31/GB ($168 for 128GB kit)

Best Value for Laptop Upgrades (16GB):

  • DDR3/DDR3L SODIMM: ~$1.00/GB ($16-17 for 16GB kit)

Bulk Buyers:

  • DDR4 256GB (4x64GB): $0.64/GB
  • DDR3 80GB (10x8GB): $1.00/GB

Important Notes:

  1. DDR3 offers the best price per GB but is older technology
  2. DDR4 and DDR5 offer better performance at slightly higher cost
  3. Always check compatibility with your motherboard before purchasing
  4. Server/ECC memory requires compatible server motherboards
  5. Prices fluctuate - verify current pricing on Amazon before purchase

Recommendation: For most users upgrading older systems, the TEAMGROUP Elite 16GB DDR3 kit at $15.99 ($1.00/GB) offers the best value.

For newer DDR4 systems, the Kuesuny 32GB DDR4 kit at $42.79 ($1.34/GB) is excellent value.
